Summary: egg/oval in sky, still, then disappered before my eyes
divs: sighting detailsafter me and my husband went to lunch, we headed down to my inlaws house for a visit, driving towards the sun, my husband pointed out this metal looking egg\oval type object in the sky , just under the sun , it was still not moving, it was quite far away but still could see the shape clearly. so i assume it was very big. we drive down the road for about another 5 secs, and it was like it faded away. we couldnt believe our eyes, we get to the red light down the road, turn left, drive a little more and we see it again hovering. and it faded once more. clear blue skys no clouds what so ever.
